title: Violence and Self Defense - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/4/17
itunes:title: Violence and Self Defense - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/4/17
description:
George Noory and self defense expert Tim Larkin discuss the changes in society that have taken rights away from citizens to protect themselves from violent criminals and how to get those rights back.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
